About Apple Hill Playhouse

Apple Hill Playhouse is home of Orchard Performing Arts Company, Inc. (OPAC).

We are a non-profit (501c3) organization who's mission is "to preserve and advance the traditions of live theatre, through entertainment and education. Our goal is to foster public interest in and awareness of the performing arts, thereby developing a contingent of knowledgeable theatre patrons. It seeks to serve persons of all ages, in the Tri-State area, by continuing to strive for excellence in all endeavors."

Our mission's success depends on the generosity of our patrons. The revenue we generate from ticket sales is only a part of what we need to continue the quality entertainment and education Apple Hill Playhouse is known for. Your tax deductible gifts and grants are key to our existence and viability. Thank you for your support, patronage, and generosity.

~ The OPAC Board of Directors
